basics.name: Elverth Alexander Pulido González
basics.label: Full Stack Systems Engineer with Experience in Mobile and Backend Development
basics.summary:
Software Developer passionate about creating technological solutions. My primary focus has been on software development using technologies such as React Native, Angular, JavaScript, Node.js, PHP, Java, Spring, and RESTful APIs. 
I excel in my ability to work as part of a team. I believe in collaboration and effective communication as key to success in technological projects. I am looking for opportunities that allow me to apply my knowledge and skills in developing challenging and impactful projects.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Development of mobile and web applications using technologies such as React Native, JavaScript, Node.js, Java, Spring, PHP, Flight, and RESTful APIs. Worked on software development projects like Tuintichat Xtreme and its social network.

work.name: SEAPTO S.A. GanaGana
work.summary: Designed and developed a rental management platform and API, replacing the old rental management system. This allowed the company to manage the leasing of commercial spaces more efficiently.

Curso de Backend con Node.js: API REST con Express.js
Curso Profesional de Git y GitHub
Curso de Fundamentos de Java Spring Boot

highlights: Uses technologies such as React Native, Expo, Google Maps API, PHP, Flight, MariaDB
